column1: Little Goat Diner////When it came out it looked as appetizing as everything else. When I bit in
column2: the chihuahua and blue cheese masa was devastatingly pungent and distinctly unpleasant
column3: with zero chihuahua and only the bluest
column4: reekiest blue cheese in it. I passed it around the table to see if I was crazy and my colleagues agreed that it was extremely overwhelming and ruined the dish.
